name: no escape (itch) (quabmara, Madelaine21)
description:
This game is relaxing-lofi-music and stressful-dodging-obstacles all in one!

Try to avoid approaching enemies while being locked in place and beat your highscore all while listening to music and watching the cat sleep.

Have fun playing!

(don't forget to  comment your highscore)

Controls:

w,a,s,d / arrow-keys to move around

space to play (again)

We did not make the music, it's from here: https://www.freelofi.com/lofi-yellow/ (LOFI YELLOW SIX - DELANO T. JARRETT)

This game was made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 114 with the theme ANIME and the limitation LOCKED IN PLACE
